question:
Fill in the Blank:

She was ________ the news of her promotion.
solution:
glad about

'Glad about' is used to express happiness regarding something.

Hindi Meaning: प्रसन्न

Complete Sentence:

She was glad about the news of her promotion.

वह अपनी पदोन्नति की खबर से खुश थी।

Extra Example:

I am glad about your progress.

मैं तुम्हारी प्रगति से खुश हूँ।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

She is very ________ painting.
solution:
good at

‘Good at’ means skilled in something.

Hindi Meaning: किसी चीज़ में कुशल या प्रतिभाशाली

Complete Sentence:

She is very good at painting.

वह पेंटिंग में बहुत निपुण है।

Extra Example:

She is good at painting.

वह पेंटिंग में अच्छी है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

I am ________ your help during the project.
solution:
grateful for

‘Grateful for’ means thankful for something.

Hindi Meaning: किसी बात के लिए आभारी होना

Complete Sentence:

I am grateful for your help.

मैं आपकी मदद के लिए आभारी हूँ।

Extra Example:

I am grateful for your help.

मैं तुम्हारी मदद के लिए आभारी हूँ।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

I am ________ you for your help.
solution:
grateful to

'Grateful to' is used to show thanks to a person.

Hindi Meaning: किसी व्यक्ति के प्रति आभारी

Complete Sentence:

I am grateful to you for your help.

मैं आपकी मदद के लिए आपका आभारी हूँ।

Extra Example:

I am grateful to my teacher.

मैं अपने शिक्षक के प्रति आभारी हूँ।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

She expressed her deep ________ the loss of her pet.
solution:
grief over

'Grief over' means sorrow due to loss.

Hindi Meaning: किसी नुकसान का दुःख

Complete Sentence:

She expressed her deep grief over the loss of her pet.

उसने अपने पालतू जानवर की मृत्यु पर गहरा शोक व्यक्त किया।

Extra Example:

He felt deep grief over his loss.

उसे अपनी हानि पर गहरा दुख हुआ।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

She holds a long-time ________ her rival.
solution:
grudge against

'Grudge against' means resentment.

Hindi Meaning: लगातार नाराजगी की भावना

Complete Sentence:

She holds a long-time grudge against her rival.

वह अपनी प्रतिद्वंद्वी के प्रति लंबे समय से दुश्मनी रखती है।

Extra Example:

He holds a grudge against his neighbor.

वह अपने पड़ोसी से नाराज़गी रखता है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

She is ________ stealing money.
solution:
guilty of

'Guilty of' refers to having committed a crime or mistake.

Hindi Meaning: गलत काम के लिए जिम्मेदार

Complete Sentence:

She is guilty of stealing money.

वह पैसे चुराने की अपराधी है।

Extra Example:

He was found guilty of theft.

वह चोरी का दोषी पाया गया।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

A ________ smoking is hard to break.
solution:
habit of

‘Habit of’ is the correct structure.

Hindi Meaning: नियमित अभ्यास

Complete Sentence:

A habit of smoking is hard to break.

धूम्रपान की आदत छोड़ना मुश्किल होती है।

Extra Example:

He has a habit of waking up early.

उसे जल्दी उठने की आदत है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

I’m ________ your success.
solution:
happy for

'Happy for' is used to show joy on someone else's behalf.

Hindi Meaning: किसी और के लिए खुश

Complete Sentence:

I’m happy for your success.

मुझे तुम्हारी सफलता पर खुशी है।

Extra Example:

I am happy for your success.

मैं तुम्हारी सफलता के लिए खुश हूँ।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He is not ________ the results.
solution:
happy with

‘Happy with’ means satisfied or pleased.

Hindi Meaning: संतुष्ट एवं प्रसन्न

Complete Sentence:

He is not happy with the results.

वह परिणामों से संतुष्ट नहीं है।

Extra Example:

He is happy with his marks.

वह अपने अंकों से खुश है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

Did you ________ the latest news?
solution:
hear about

‘Hear about’ is used when someone learns of an event or situation.

Hindi Meaning: किसी चीज़ के बारे में समाचार या जानकारी प्राप्त करना

Complete Sentence:

Did you hear about the latest news?

क्या आपने ताजा खबर के बारे में सुना?

Extra Example:

Did you hear about the accident?

क्या तुमने दुर्घटना के बारे में सुना?

question:
Fill in the Blank:

I hope to ________ her soon.
solution:
hear from

‘Hear from’ means to receive communication from someone.

Hindi Meaning: किसी से संचार प्राप्त करने के लिए

Complete Sentence:

I hope to hear from her soon.

मुझे उम्मीद है कि मुझे उससे जल्द संपर्क मिलेगा।

Extra Example:

I heard from him yesterday.

कल उसकी ओर से खबर आई।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

Have you ever ________ this rare disease?
solution:
hear of

‘Hear of’ refers to knowing of the existence of something.

Hindi Meaning: किसी के अस्तित्व के प्रति जागरूक होना

Complete Sentence:

Have you ever heard of this rare disease?

क्या आपने कभी इस दुर्लभ बीमारी के बारे में सुना है?

Extra Example:

I’ve never heard of him.

मैंने उसके बारे में कभी नहीं सुना।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The teacher helped him ________ solving the equation.
solution:
help in

‘Help in’ means to assist with a task.

Hindi Meaning: किसी कार्य या गतिविधि में सहायता करना

Complete Sentence:

The teacher helped him in solving the equation.

शिक्षक ने उसे समीकरण हल करने में मदद की।

Extra Example:

She helped in organizing the event.

उसने कार्यक्रम के आयोजन में मदद की।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

Thank you for ________ me with the preparations.
solution:
help with

‘Help with’ means to assist in a task.

Hindi Meaning: किसी काम में सहायता करना

Complete Sentence:

Thank you for helping with the preparations.

तैयारियों में मदद करने के लिए धन्यवाद।

Extra Example:

Can you help me with my homework?

क्या तुम मेरा होमवर्क करने में मदद कर सकते हो?

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He is always ________ his friends.
solution:
honest with

'Honest with' is used when referring to people.

Hindi Meaning: किसी के साथ सच्चा होना

Complete Sentence:

He is always honest with his friends.

वह हमेशा अपने दोस्तों के प्रति ईमानदार रहता है।

Extra Example:

She is honest with her friends.

वह अपने दोस्तों के साथ ईमानदार है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

We should never lose ________ a better future.
solution:
hope for

‘Hope for’ is used for something desirable.

Hindi Meaning: किसी अच्छे काम की उम्मीद

Complete Sentence:

We should never lose hope for a better future.

हमें बेहतर भविष्य की आशा कभी नहीं छोड़नी चाहिए।

Extra Example:

We have hope for peace.

हमें शांति की आशा है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He lost all ________ success after repeated failures.
solution:
hope of

‘Hope of’ refers to expectation or possibility.

Hindi Meaning: किसी सकारात्मक चीज़ की उम्मीद या संभावना

Complete Sentence:

He lost all hope of success after repeated failures.

लगातार असफलताओं के बाद उसने सफलता की सारी उम्मीद खो दी।

Extra Example:

There is little hope of recovery.

ठीक होने की थोड़ी ही संभावना है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

They continue to ________ a better future.
solution:
hope to

‘Hope to’ is used before a verb, expressing intent.

Hindi Meaning: कुछ करने की उम्मीद या इरादा रखना

Complete Sentence:

They continue to hope to build a better future.

वे एक बेहतर भविष्य बनाने की आशा करते हैं।

Extra Example:

I hope to visit Kashmir this year.

मैं इस साल कश्मीर जाने की आशा करता हूँ।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

They were ________ outsiders.
solution:
hostile to

'Hostile to' means unfriendly or aggressive toward.

Hindi Meaning: अमित्र

Complete Sentence:

They were hostile to outsiders.

वे बाहरी लोगों के प्रति शत्रुतापूर्ण थे।

Extra Example:

He is hostile to strangers.

वह अजनबियों के प्रति शत्रुतापूर्ण है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He is ________ outsiders.
solution:
hostile towards

'Hostile towards' means unfriendly or antagonistic.

Hindi Meaning: अमित्र या विरोधी

Complete Sentence:

He is hostile towards outsiders.

वह बाहरी लोगों के प्रति शत्रुतापूर्ण है।

Extra Example:

He was hostile towards the visitors.

वह आगंतुकों के प्रति शत्रुतापूर्ण था।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

Do you have any ________ the topic?
solution:
idea about

'Idea about' means general understanding.

Hindi Meaning: किसी चीज़ की समझ

Complete Sentence:

Do you have any idea about the topic?

क्या तुम्हें विषय के बारे में कोई जानकारी है?

Extra Example:

He has no idea about the project.

उसे प्रोजेक्ट के बारे में कोई जानकारी नहीं है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

Some people are naturally ________ certain diseases.
solution:
immune to

'Immune to' means protected against.

Hindi Meaning: से संरक्षित

Complete Sentence:

Some people are immune to certain diseases.

कुछ लोग कुछ बीमारियों के प्रति प्रतिरक्षित होते हैं।

Extra Example:

She is immune to the disease.

वह बीमारी से प्रतिरक्षित है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The speech had a huge ________ the audience.
solution:
impact of

'Impact of' shows the source or cause.

Hindi Meaning: प्रभाव या असर

Complete Sentence:

The speech had a huge impact of inspiration.

भाषण ने प्रेरणा का बड़ा प्रभाव डाला।

Extra Example:

The impact of social media is huge.

सोशल मीडिया का प्रभाव बहुत बड़ा है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The new rule had a significant ________ productivity.
solution:
impact on

'Impact on' indicates influence or effect.

Hindi Meaning: प्रभाव या असर

Complete Sentence:

The new rule had a significant impact on productivity.

नए नियम का उत्पादकता पर बड़ा प्रभाव पड़ा।

Extra Example:

The speech had a big impact on me.

भाषण का मुझ पर गहरा प्रभाव पड़ा।
